attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the light of the vehicle industries downturn and the hint of bridge loans or rescue packages to foreign or homegrown manufacturers, we ask that if any loan is given it is on the agreement that no worker shall be made redundant, within a two year period from loan or package.  Otherwise the company should pay immediately any money back or have assets seized to pay for loan.  And to refuse any manifacturer help who has already forced people into redundancies.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
